column1: Local Foods////Some highlights about the menu are that any of their tasty sandwiches can be deconstructed and served as a salad
column2: which is ideal for anyone that likes a zesty vegetable party sans carbs. You can also choose two sides with your meal
column3: which is excellent if you're anything like me and want it all. The house made potato chips are slivers of salty
column4: crispy goodness - my recommendation is to tack these onto your plate with an also tasty and healthier side
column5: like the quinoa or kale salad. Another plus is the house-made juice! The Mintade is a fresh mix of squeezed citruses - grapefruit
column8: and lime with a finishing touch of mint and it's gonna rock your world.
